name: 迪伦·洛克
introduction: Dylan Rourke is an American actor known for his work in film (Send It! (2021), Bury the Bride (2023), Jezebel (2017)) and in television series including Grey's Anatomy (2005), Modern Family (2009), Mistresses (2013), In the Vault (2017), Trevor and the Virgin (2019), Station 19 (2018), 9-1-1: Lone Star (2020), and others. On stage, he played Happy Loman in Ruskin Theatre's acclaimed 70th-anniversary revival of Arthur Miller's "Death of a Salesman," joining co-stars Rob Morrow, Lee Garlington, and Robert Adamson. Dylan also performed for several years with legendary comic actor Fred Willard in his MoHos sketch-comedy troupe.Dylan studied improvisational and sketch comedy with The Groundlings, Second City, and Upright Citizens Brigade and honed his acting skills with Larry Moss, Anthony Meindl, Carter Thor Studio, and Matthew Arkin. He holds a business degree from Arizona State University.
